column3: Latest;Kampong Thom: Raids on illegal mining sites ended with the arrest of 10 Chinese nationals in Sandan district
column4: Kompong Thom province.------ Kampong Thom Provincial Gendarmerie
column6: launched the operation in three locations in Sokhdom commune at 15:00 on the 11th to 14th of March. 2019.------The 10 Chinese nationals are being held for questioning and a large amount of equipment
column8: machines and generators have been taken as evidence.
